SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM BB B INNER JOIN MEM M ON B.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM AND M.LEAVE_D IS NULL WHERE B.DEL_D IS NULL
AND M.NM LIKE '%' || #{searchtext} || '%'
and B.TXT_NUM LIKE '%' || #{searchtext} || '%'
and B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchtext} || '%'

SELECT B.TXT_NUM , M.NM , B.TITLE , B.HIT,B.CON, TO_CHAR(B.REG_D , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_D FROM BB B INNER JOIN MEM M ON B.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM AND M.LEAVE_D IS NULL WHERE B.DEL_D IS NULL AND B.TXT_NUM=#{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE BB SET HIT = HIT + 1 WHERE TXT_NUM = #{num}
UPDATE BB SET DEL_D=SYSDATE WHERE TXT_NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BB(TXT_NUM , TITLE, MEM_NUM, CON) VALUES(BB_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{title} , #{MemNum} , #{con})
